Title: [NEW][ICO] 💎 SKRAPS.IO - Spare Change Investing💎
Body: Of course! Through Skraps, we envision to make crypto investing simple and fun by taking away the cognitive burden of investing. The spare change from each transaction in cryptocurrencies will be invested through our platform in the risk-adjusted portfolios of user’s choice. These portfolios are managed by professional portfolio managers and which ensures best return on investment.

Author: elrugrim
Title: [NEW][ICO] 💎 SKRAPS.IO - Spare Change Investing💎
Body: Yes the quantity is limited. The total number of SKRAPS token which will be ever created is 110 mn. Out of this 66 mn will be available as part of the token sale in ICO and whitelist. 11 mn tokens each will be reserved for founders and advisors/team. 5.5 mn tokens will be reserved for spending in Marketing and Bounty programs. 16.5 mn tokens will not be issued at the time of ICO and will be reserved for a future token issue

Title: [NEW][ICO] 💎 SKRAPS.IO - Spare Change Investing💎
Body: We believe that as the blockchain industry expands and the number and value of crypto assets increase, the market for crypto-investing and speculation will also grow. Crypto markets, unlike traditional markets, are borderless, open 24/7, subject to minimal regulatory control and offer huge potentials for growth. Because of these characteristics, crypto markets represent an incredible opportunity for investors over traditional markets.

Title: [NEW][ICO] 💎 SKRAPS.IO - Spare Change Investing💎
Body: The Skraps platform will facilitate the process of investing in cryptocurrencies, saving users from the constant torments of choosing where, when, and what to invest. We are all well aware that even the most experienced investors can "lose" time to realize the optimal investment. The best strategy is to create a diversified portfolio based on an acceptable level of risk and to make systematic investments, i.e. to invest certain amounts of money at regular intervals. Due to this averaging in time you don't need to pick the exact time for conducting transactions in the market. - it's a quote.

Author: lagharto
Title: [NEW][ICO] 💎 SKRAPS.IO - Spare Change Investing💎
Body: as an example, suppose Alice buys a ticket on AirBaltic flight using bitcoins. The price of the ticket is 12,98 BTC. It pays 12.98 BTC for the ticket. It then enters the Skraps app and rounds the payment amount to 13.00 watts. The remaining 0.02 is an investment. 0.02 BTC is invested in the selected portfolio. Suppose that Alice has chosen a Conservative portfolio. Then 0.02 BTC will be credited to the Conservative portfolio on the Skraps platform. Similarly, the balance of the transaction amount in Fiat currency is invested in the selected cryptocurrency portfolio. The same principle applies to Fiat currencies. If Alice bought coffee for $ 3.75. US, it can round up the purchase amount to $ 4.00. The US and the difference (0.25 dollars. US) will be invested in the portfolio.

Author: okaypool
Title: [NEW][ICO] 💎 SKRAPS.IO - Spare Change Investing💎
Body: what kind of portfolio ?

Author: lagharto
Title: [NEW][ICO] 💎 SKRAPS.IO - Spare Change Investing💎
Body: At the initial stage, the Skraps platform will offer 5 types of portfolios: • Conservative • Moderately conservative * Moderate * Moderately aggressive • Aggressive The Skraps platform is primarily designed to invest in a cryptocurrency portfolio of small amounts of transactions in cryptocurrency, but in order to attract more people to such investments, we will also provide an opportunity to invest in a portfolio of cryptocurrency Fiat currencies. Thus, users will be able to round off the amount of transactions made in the Fiat currency, and the balance of the rounded transaction amount will be credited to the portfolio on the Skraps platform.

They can decide how much they want to round to the nearest decimal point after the transaction is completed. For example, if the user purchases in the amount 24.356 BTC, it can be rounded to 24.36 BTC, 24.4 BTC or 25 BTC. * Invest balance-the Balance of the payment is automatically invested in the selected wallet. Users don't have to do anything other than watch the growing numbers in their wallet.

Author: arjaymanalo
Title: [NEW][ICO] 💎 SKRAPS.IO - Spare Change Investing💎
Body: This is the different kind of In SKRAPS they can manage all of this kind of investor Conservative - These are very safe investments that grow over a long period of time. If you are comfortable accepting lower returns with low risk investments, this is for you. Moderately Conservative - is ideal for those who values principal preservation, but is comfortable accepting a small degree of risk and volatility to seek some degree of appreciation. Invest on this portfolio if you desire greater liquidity, is willing to accept lower returns, and is willing to accept minimal losses. Moderate - Moderate investing may be low or moderate risk. These have long-term returns and with modest and considerable risk. You are a moderate investor if you accept value reducing risk and want reasonable, but relatively stable income and capital growth. Moderately Aggressive – Investment with higher long-term returns with significant risk. If you believe that higher long-term returns are more important than protecting principal and can endure large losses in favour of potentially higher long-term returns, then you fall on this category. Aggressive – A portfolio management that attempts to maximize returns by taking a relatively higher degree of risk. It involves extensive volatility and significant losses. Along with the prospect of higher returns, aggressive investments also carry a higher-than-average risk of losing significant amount of your investment. You would be an aggressive investor if you believe maximizing long-term returns is more important than protecting principal and liquidity is generally not your concern.

Author: nrvkush
Title: [NEW][ICO] 💎 SKRAPS.IO - Spare Change Investing💎
Body: What is the reason for you to sale tokens?

Author: Groc
Title: [NEW][ICO] 💎 SKRAPS.IO - Spare Change Investing💎
Body: The key reasons which inclined us towards a token sale are:  •   SKRAPS token will be used to pay the portfolio managers in the platform. This would ensure that the incentives of the portfolio managers are aligned with those of the Skrap platform. Since portfolio managers are paid in tokens, they will benefit if the tokens increase in value. If the portfolio managers are able to generate good returns, more customers will be attracted to Skraps for investing which will increase the demand of the token and this its price. This is win-win for both the portfolio managers and the platform. •   Token sale (ICO) is a good way to generate initial investment which can fund the early development and marketing of the product.

Title: [NEW][ICO] 💎 SKRAPS.IO - Spare Change Investing💎
Body: Many people understand the general value of investing but very few understand the power of compounding. As mentioned above, millennials today think that they don’t have enough money to invest in stock markets and they believe that it takes a lot of money to get started. They don’t realize that the sooner they start investing, the higher chance they have of benefiting from the compound returns.

Author: 23coins
Title: [NEW][ICO] 💎 SKRAPS.IO - Spare Change Investing💎
Body: Why “spare change investing” makes sense for cryptocurrencies?

Author: elrugrim
Title: [NEW][ICO] 💎 SKRAPS.IO - Spare Change Investing💎
Body: •   Skraps platform will help people invest in cryptocurrency in an easy way, without feeling the cognitive burden to take out time to invest and chose the assets to invest in. We all know that even the best investors can’t time the market perfectly. The best strategy is to build a diversified portfolio based on one’s risk appetite and do systematic investments i.e. invest a specified amount of money in regular time intervals. This time averaging takes away the need to time the market perfectly. •   Skraps is a unique way to encourage this systematic investment for crypto tokens. Especially since crypto tokens are very volatile, people tend to buy in upswings and sell in downswings. This is not a good strategy as people are just reacting to rumors in these cases. Skraps takes the cognitive burden away from investing and helps you save in your day to day transactions.

Author: Groc
Title: [NEW][ICO] 💎 SKRAPS.IO - Spare Change Investing💎
Body: Most of the cryptocurrencies ( like BTC, ETH, Litecoin) allow transactions in fractional amount. Each bitcoin (BTC) is divisible to the 8th decimal place, so each BTC can be split into 100,000,000 units. Each unit of bitcoin, or 0.00000001 bitcoin, is called a satoshi. A Satoshi is the smallest unit of Bitcoin. The smallest unit of ETH is called Wei, and is 1x10-18 ETH.

Author: 23coins
Title: [NEW][ICO] 💎 SKRAPS.IO - Spare Change Investing💎
Body: Why “spare change investing” makes sense for cryptocurrencies?

Author: elrugrim
Title: [NEW][ICO] 💎 SKRAPS.IO - Spare Change Investing💎
Body: Skraps platform will help people invest in cryptocurrency in an easy way, without feeling the cognitive burden to take out time to invest and chose the assets to invest in. We all know that even the best investors can’t time the market perfectly. The best strategy is to build a diversified portfolio based on one’s risk appetite and do systematic investments i.e. invest a specified amount of money in regular time intervals. This time averaging takes away the need to time the market perfectly.

Author: 23coins
Title: [NEW][ICO] 💎 SKRAPS.IO - Spare Change Investing💎
Body: So that’s all? Maybe you have something more for me to tell or to explain, something specific?

Author: elrugrim
Title: [NEW][ICO] 💎 SKRAPS.IO - Spare Change Investing💎
Body: Skraps is a unique way to encourage this systematic investment for crypto tokens. Especially since crypto tokens are very volatile, people tend to buy in upswings and sell in downswings. This is not a good strategy as people are just reacting to rumors in these cases. Skraps takes the cognitive burden away from investing and helps you save in your day to day transactions.

Title: [NEW][ICO] 💎 SKRAPS.IO - Spare Change Investing💎

Author: elrugrim
Title: [NEW][ICO] 💎 SKRAPS.IO - Spare Change Investing💎
Body: ● Connect Your Wallet - Users first need to connect their cryptocurrency wallets or debit/credit cards which they use to make purchases to the Skrap platform ● Make a Purchase - Users can then go on spending like normal. They can decide how much they want to round up to the nearest decimal point after they have made the transaction. For example, if someone buys a coffee for $2.75, you can round up that purchase to $3, and the difference ($0.25) gets invested in a portfolio of your choice. ● Invest Your Change - The spare change is automatically invested in their chosen portfolio. Users don’t need to do anything, but to watch their wealth grow.

Author: atejeanelle
Title: [NEW][ICO] 💎 SKRAPS.IO - Spare Change Investing💎
Body: One of the key features of SKRAPS are  NO ONEROUS REQUIREMENTS Skraps made cryptocurrency investing as simple and intuitive as possible. Some of the salient features of their platform are: ● No minimum or maximum amount of investments ● No minimum or maximum balance ● No withdrawal fees ● No payment delays. Instant payment processing ● Instant withdrawals ● Anonymous. No social security numbers required  SECURED DATA All of your data is protected with 256-bit encryption and never stored on your devices. Customers’ peace of mind is Skraps’ highest priority. and they work hard to protect users’ information, prevent unauthorized account access and notify you of any unusual activity in your account.  INVEST JUST YOUR SPARE CHANGE Skraps enables users to invest the spare change from everyday fiat and cryptocurrency transactions into a diversified portfolio of their choice. Users can simply connect their debit/credit cards or wallets to the app, spend like normal, and invest their spare change. Users can round up those transactions to any decimal place.  LEADERBOARD Skraps will also have an additional "Leaderboard" feature that allows any user to create a portfolio and share it with the network. Portfolio owners will earn tokens from those who wish to copy their portfolios.  As a Skraps portfolio manager, you will have 20% share from users and 5% fee for Skraps platform paid monthly calculated on the profit and not on the whole amount. This is payable every 31st day.  However, if your portfolio manager failed and made losses, Skraps will waive off everything; no 20% to fund manager, no 5% platform fee to Skraps. It’s a no gain no fee situation. No “rubbing of salt to the wound” so to speak!  For more details please note the following important links: Official website: http://ico.skraps.io/# Token Sale: https://skraps.typeform.com/to/S7LlFO SKRAPS Whitepaper: http://ico.skraps.io/SKRAPS_White_Paper.pdf Official Telegram: https://t.me/SkrapsOfficial

Author: atejeanelle
Title: [NEW][ICO] 💎 SKRAPS.IO - Spare Change Investing💎
Body: Below is a description of Skraps’ different portfolios initially on offer:  1.   Conservative - These are very safe investments that grow over a long period of time. If you are comfortable accepting lower returns with low risk investments, this is for you. 2.   Moderately Conservative - is ideal for those who values principal preservation, but is comfortable accepting a small degree of risk and volatility to seek some degree of appreciation. Invest on this portfolio if you desire greater liquidity, is willing to accept lower returns, and is willing to accept minimal losses. 3.   Moderate - Moderate investing may be low or moderate risk. These have long-term returns and with modest and considerable risk. You are a moderate investor if you accept value reducing risk and want reasonable, but relatively stable income and capital growth. 4.   Moderately Aggressive – Investment with higher long-term returns with significant risk. If you believe that higher long-term returns are more important than protecting principal and can endure large losses in favour of potentially higher long-term returns, then you fall on this category. 5.   Aggressive – A portfolio management that attempts to maximize returns by taking a relatively higher degree of risk. It involves extensive volatility and significant losses. Along with the prospect of higher returns, aggressive investments also carry a higher-than-average risk of losing significant amount of your investment. You would be an aggressive investor if you believe maximizing long-term returns is more important than protecting principal and liquidity is generally not your concern.

Body: So what are the advantages of investing in SKRAPS?  Skraps’ platform is focused on keeping the user experience very simple and intuitive so that anyone, young and old alike can come on the platform and start their investing journey and create their cryptocurrency portfolio.  Easy to invest. Skraps has designed investing cryptocurrencies, in three very easy steps. Just remember this 3 letters: CSI, and it’s as easy as pie.   Low cognitive load Since all the investments are made from the spare change of a transaction, you don’t need to consciously decide if you want to invest and how much you want to invest. You just need to choose how much you want to round up to, and the spare amount is invested directly in a portfolio of your choice. Pretty soon you become accustomed to rounding off your purchases and investing becomes your second nature.  Invest based on your risk preference In Skraps, you can choose to invest in a portfolio which suits the risk you prefer. Whether you are a conservative or aggressive investor, Skraps has something to offer. If you are a risk taker type, then you can invest in Aggressive Portfolio. This portfolio can generate a higher rate of return but is subjected to higher market risk. If you are a modest risk taker, a Conservative Portfolio would be more suited as you would not want to risk your savings. Conservative investment has lower rate of risk and a lower return.  You control what you invest Since investment starts with every transaction, you control how much you invest by how much you round off your transaction in a fractional amount, and the spare amount is invested directly in a portfolio of your choice. With Skraps platform, the “spare change” you would normally forget in your purse, bag or coat pockets will go a long way. Try compounding your investment and see how far your spare change go.  No onerous requirements Skraps made cryptocurrency investing as simple and intuitive as possible. Some of the salient features of their platform are: ● No minimum or maximum amount of investments ● No minimum or maximum balance ● No withdrawal fees ● No payment delays. Instant payment processing ● Instant withdrawals ● Anonymous. No social security numbers required  Secured Data All of your data is protected with 256-bit encryption and never stored on your devices. Customers’ peace of mind is Skraps’ highest priority. and they work hard to protect users’ information, prevent unauthorized account access and notify you of any unusual activity in your account.  Leader board and Community Incentives Skraps will also have an additional "Leaderboard" feature that allows any user to create a portfolio and share it with the network. Portfolio owners will earn tokens from those who wish to copy their portfolios.  As a Skraps portfolio manager, you will have 20% share from users and 5% fee for Skraps platform paid monthly calculated on the profit and not on the whole amount. This is payable every 31st day.  However, if your portfolio manager failed and made losses, Skraps will waive off everything; no 20% to fund manager, no 5% platform fee to Skraps. It’s a no gain no fee situation. No “rubbing of salt to the wound” so to speak!  With SKRAPS, you can make total or partial withdrawal in your choice of currency, directly to your wallet or bank account in any currency of your choice.  It will be connected to a few exchanges where it will buy from, but the coins will stay in Skrap platform and so you will have a wallet for each crypto that you own.  Skraps will list the top 50 cryptocurrency in the market and will continually add more to suit community.

Author: arjaymanalo
Title: [NEW][ICO] 💎 SKRAPS.IO - Spare Change Investing💎
Body: Before you start investing, it is very important that you learn about the different types of investments, and what those investments can do for you. Understand the risks involved, and pay attention to past trends as well. History does indeed repeat itself, and investors know this first hand!  Below is a description of Skraps’ different portfolios initially on offer:  Conservative - These are very safe investments that grow over a long period of time. If you are comfortable accepting lower returns with low risk investments, this is for you. Moderately Conservative - is ideal for those who values principal preservation, but is comfortable accepting a small degree of risk and volatility to seek some degree of appreciation. Invest on this portfolio if you desire greater liquidity, is willing to accept lower returns, and is willing to accept minimal losses. Moderate - Moderate investing may be low or moderate risk. These have long-term returns and with modest and considerable risk. You are a moderate investor if you accept value reducing risk and want reasonable, but relatively stable income and capital growth. Moderately Aggressive – Investment with higher long-term returns with significant risk. If you believe that higher long-term returns are more important than protecting principal and can endure large losses in favour of potentially higher long-term returns, then you fall on this category. Aggressive – A portfolio management that attempts to maximize returns by taking a relatively higher degree of risk. It involves extensive volatility and significant losses. Along with the prospect of higher returns, aggressive investments also carry a higher-than-average risk of losing significant amount of your investment. You would be an aggressive investor if you believe maximizing long-term returns is more important than protecting principal and liquidity is generally not your concern. All these portfolios are designed by experienced cryptocurrency managers who will invest in assets guided by the risk-return profile of the selected portfolio. These portfolios will be accessible by users for free. Each user will be able to view the contents of every portfolio and even copy it in order to use it on other exchanges. Users can freely switch between different portfolios as well, without any switching charges.

Body: Yes, there is such protection is provided. It centers around the idea, that main smart-contracts will be created, using the method of multiple parties’ digital signatures. Thus, for any big change will be needed the keys, that only portfolio manager and Skraps Administrator have. This ensures, that only smart-contracts, that have been approved by an administrator, will be added into a main smart-contract.

Author: atejeanelle
Title: [NEW][ICO] 💎 SKRAPS.IO - Spare Change Investing💎
Body: Below is a description of Skraps’ different portfolios initially on offer:  1.   Conservative - These are very safe investments that grow over a long period of time. If you are comfortable accepting lower returns with low risk investments, this is for you.  2.   Moderately Conservative - is ideal for those who values principal preservation, but is comfortable accepting a small degree of risk and volatility to seek some degree of appreciation. Invest on this portfolio if you desire greater liquidity, is willing to accept lower returns, and is willing to accept minimal losses.  3.   Moderate - Moderate investing may be low or moderate risk. These have long-term returns and with modest and considerable risk. You are a moderate investor if you accept value reducing risk and want reasonable, but relatively stable income and capital growth.  4.   Moderately Aggressive – Investment with higher long-term returns with significant risk. If you believe that higher long-term returns are more important than protecting principal and can endure large losses in favour of potentially higher long-term returns, then you fall on this category.  5.   Aggressive – A portfolio management that attempts to maximize returns by taking a relatively higher degree of risk. It involves extensive volatility and significant losses. Along with the prospect of higher returns, aggressive investments also carry a higher-than-average risk of losing significant amount of your investment. You would be an aggressive investor if you believe maximizing long-term returns is more important than protecting principal and liquidity is generally not your concern.

Author: atejeanelle
Title: [NEW][ICO] 💎 SKRAPS.IO - Spare Change Investing💎
Body: So what are the advantages of investing in SKRAPS?  Skraps’ platform is focused on keeping the user experience very simple and intuitive so that anyone, young and old alike can come on the platform and start their investing journey and create their cryptocurrency portfolio.  Easy to invest. Skraps has designed investing cryptocurrencies, in three very easy steps. Just remember this 3 letters: CSI, and it’s as easy as pie.  1.   Connect Your Wallet – As a user, first you need to connect your cryptocurrency wallets which you use to make purchases to the Skrap platform  2.   Spend or make a Purchase - Go on spending like normal. You can decide how much you want to round up to the nearest decimal point after you have made the transaction. For example, you made a purchase of 8.678 BTC, you can round up the purchase to 8.68 BTC, 8.7 BTC or 9 BTC.  3.   Invest Your Change - The spare change is automatically invested in your chosen portfolio. You don’t need to do anything, but to watch your wealth grow.

Author: atejeanelle
Title: [NEW][ICO] 💎 SKRAPS.IO - Spare Change Investing💎
Body: But what is Skraps and what does it do?  Skraps is a microinvestment platform where you can invest just your spare change. It is a ground-breaking app designed for crypto-currency and fiat purchases. Users can invest their spare change from cryptocurrency or fiat transactions into a diversified cryptocurrency- related portfolios to earn the rewards of consistent investing.  Picture yourself having a coffee with your friends. Then when paying the $3.75 coffee decided to round it off to $4.00. Through Skraps platform, your spare change you rounded off will be invested to a portfolio of your choice, then just watch that spare change grow. It’s that easy!  For example, you made a purchase of 8.678 BTC, you can round up the purchase to 8.68 BTC, 8.7 BTC or 9 BTC. The amount you rounded off from your transactions will be automatically invested in any cryptocurrency you want according to your risk preference.  ICO Jan 15- Feb 15, 2018  Get whitelisted now.

Author: atejeanelle
Title: [NEW][ICO] 💎 SKRAPS.IO - Spare Change Investing💎
Body: As  users keep investing in the Skraps platform, their cryptocurrency investments will increase in value. Its app focussed mainly on making the small change to add up. Users can invest their spare change from cryptocurrency or fiat transactions into a diversified cryptocurrency- related portfolios to earn the rewards of consistent investing less the cognitive burden of investing but in a smooth and easy way. It's commitment is to make investing very simple and intuitive so that everyone can benefit from the returns of disciplined investing.  Skraps platform will initially offer 5 different portfolios  1.  Conservative 2.  Moderately Conservative 3.  Moderate 4.  Moderately Aggressive 5.  Aggressive  All these portfolios are designed by experienced cryptocurrency managers who will invest in assets guided by the risk-return profile of the selected portfolio. These portfolios will be accessible by users for free. Users can view these portfolios and copy them for their use.  Skraps is primarily focussed on investing spare change from cryptocurrencies transactions to cryptocurrency portfolios - but to introduce more people to crypto portfolio investment, Skraps will also provide fiat currency to crypto portfolio. So users can even chose to round up their transactions in fiat currencies and the spare amount from these transactions will be invested in crypto portfolios in Skraps platform.  Skraps ICO January 15 - February 15, 2018.

Its app focussed mainly on making the small change to add up. Users can invest their spare change from cryptocurrency or fiat transactions into a diversified cryptocurrency- related portfolios to earn the rewards of consistent investing less the cognitive burden of investing but in a smooth and easy way.  Now, Skraps is launching an interesting Initial Coin Offering (ICO) campaign to raise money for its development. ICO dates January 15, 2018 – February 15, 2018. Author: atejeanelle
Title: [NEW][ICO] 💎 SKRAPS.IO - Spare Change Investing💎
Body: What is Skraps and what does it do?  Skraps is a microinvestment platform where you can invest just your spare change. It is a ground-breaking app designed for crypto-currency and fiat purchases. Users can invest their spare change from cryptocurrency or fiat transactions into a diversified cryptocurrency- related portfolios to earn the rewards of consistent investing.  Picture yourself having a coffee with your friends. Then when paying the $3.75 coffee decided to round it off to $4.00. Through Skraps platform, your spare change you rounded off will be invested to a portfolio of your choice, then just watch that spare change grow. It’s that easy!  For example, you made a purchase of 8.678 BTC, you can round up the purchase to 8.68 BTC, 8.7 BTC or 9 BTC. Now, let the professional traders take the charges and help you grow your funds.  ICO date: January 15, 2018 - February 15, 2018

Author: GreenBits
Title: [NEW][ICO] 💎 SKRAPS.IO - Spare Change Investing💎
Body: Social Media  Twitter Telegram Medium BitcoinTalk Reddit  Distribution   SKRP Max Token Supply = 110,000,000 SKRP Availible = 66,000,000 Hard Cap = $21,450,000  The total number of SKRAPS token which will be ever created is 110 mn. Out of this 66 mn will be available as part of the token sale in ICO and whitelist. 11 mn tokens each will be reserved for founders and advisors/team. 5.5 mn tokens will be reserved for spending in Marketing and Bounty programs. 16.5 mn tokens will not be issued at the time of ICO and will be reserved for a future token issue    Overview   Through Skraps, we envision to make crypto investing simple and fun by taking away the cognitive burden of investing. The spare change from each transaction in cryptocurrencies will be invested through our platform in the risk-adjusted portfolios of user’s choice. These portfolios are managed by professional portfolio managers and which ensures best return on investment.  We believe that as the blockchain industry expands and the number and value of crypto assets increase, the market for crypto-investing and speculation will also grow. Crypto markets, unlike traditional markets, are borderless, open 24/7, subject to minimal regulatory control and offer huge potentials for growth. Because of these characteristics, crypto markets represent an incredible opportunity for investors over traditional markets.    Industry Leading Security   All of your data is protected by 256-bit encryption and never stored on your devices. Skraps works to protect your information, prevent unauthorized access, and notify you of any unusual activity.   Roadmap    Partnerships
